content.rendered:
Directed by Sachy

Written by Sachy

Cast Biju Menon (Ayyappan Nair). Prithviraj Sukumaran (Koshi Kurian). Ranjith (Kurian John). Anil Nedumangad (CI Satheesh). Johny Antony (Johny Antony). Shaju K.S.(ASI Joekuttan (as Shaju Sreedhar)). Sabumon Abdusamad (Kuttamani). Alencier Ley Lopez (K C George). Anu Mohan (CPO Sujith). Gowri Nandha (Kannamma). Reshma Rajan (Rooby (as Anna Rajan)). Dhanya Ananya (Jessy). Nanchamma (Kannamma’s Mother). Rajani Murali (Koshi’s Mother). Neelanjana (Koshi’s Daughter 1). Avani (Koshi’s Daughter 2). Kottayam Ramesh (Kumaran). Balan Parakkal (CPO Thajudeen). Aji John (Umman). Nandu Anand (Joby). Vinod Thomas (Sebastian). Vineeth Thattil David (Simon (as Vineeth Thattil)). Sundarapandian (Mon Kuttan). Benzi Mathews (Adv. Rahim). Pazhaniswamy S. Attappady (Faizal (as Pazhaniswamy S Attappady)). Saleesh N. Sankaran (DYSP (as CI Salish)). Kabeer Guruvayoor (Mansoor). Praveen Premnath (Fr. John Ishanikkal (as Praveen)). Kurian Samuel (Lodge Owner). Aravindan (Forester). Ramachandran (Tribal Officer). Dr. Manujith (CPO Manoj). Renith Elamadu (Member). Deepu G Panicker (CPO Sumesh). Anish Viswanathan (CI Kattappana). Nithin Prasad (Police Paravukaran). Radhakrishnan (CPO Radhakrishnan). Shivaprasad (Bike Lost Guy). Vinod Ganga (Sabu). Shafeeq (Suni). Vipin Kumar (Simon Team 1). Viswam (Simon Team 2). Dhaneesh (Mansoor Team 1). Vimal (Mansoor Team 2). Sai (Mansoor Team 3). Biju (Mansoor Team 4). Aadi Dev (Ayyappan Nair’s Son). Arun Pullampal (Police Team). Tomy Joseph (Police Team). Ashkar Mohammed Ali (Police Team). Pradeep Vasu (Police Team). John Mathew Manchapilly (Police Team). Faizal P.V.(Police Team (as Faizal PV)). Shiju V.K.(Police Team (as Shiju VK)). Satheesh M.K.(Police Team (as Sateesh MK)). Kuttan (Police Team). Roy (Police Team). Vishnu (Police Team). Raj (Excise Team). Pradeep (Excise Team). Akhil (Excise Team). Vineesh (Excise Team). Shaju Vk (Excise Team (as Shaju VK)). Rijo (Excise Team). Janeesh (Excise Team). Robin (Excise Team). Unnikrishnan (Forest Team). Ramesh (Forest Team). Satheesh Pakkat (Forest Team). Jijo (Forest Team). Girish (Forest Team)

Languages Malayalam

Producers Ranjith. Agnivesh Ranjith. P.M. Sasidharan

Production Gold Coin Motion Picture
